description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored 'What Is Ecosystem Architecture?', focusing on decentralized, regenerative design for healthier systems.
blurb: Ecosystem architecture, blending decentralization and regenerative design, aims to innovate through diverse disciplines, making systems healthier and more vibrant.
